TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormViewInsertedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會引發事件時的 [插入] 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Insert") 在控制項內按一下時，但之後控制項插入資料錄。The control raises the event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but after the control inserts the record. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如檢查插入作業的結果時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an insert operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞至事件處理方法，可讓您判斷受影響的記錄和任何例外狀況可能發生的數目。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要判斷受到 insert 作業的記錄數目，請使用屬性。To determine the number of records affected by the insert operation, use the property. 使用屬性來判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您也可以指定是否處理例外狀況的事件處理方法中設定屬性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果您需要存取已插入的資料錄的值，使用屬性。If you need to access the values of the inserted record, use the property. 根據預設，控制權回到指定的模式之後插入作業的屬性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an insert operation. 如果插入作業期間發生例外狀況，您可以保留控制項處於插入模式，藉由設定屬性設`true`。If an exception occurs during the insert operation, you can keep the control in insert mode by setting the property to `true`. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 如需 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件傳遞至事件處理方法，以便事件，以判斷是否在插入作業期間發生的例外狀況。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an insert operation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 參數的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||中所包含的物件`e`參數。The object contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化為`false`。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化為`false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 引發事件時，這個建構函式會使用主要由控制項開發人員。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

summary.span: 取得插入作業所影響的資料列數目。

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by the insert operation.

value.span: 插入作業所影響的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷受到 insert 作業的記錄數目。Use the property to determine the number of records affected by the insert operation. 這個屬性通常用於驗證正確的記錄數目已插入在下列情況：This property is commonly used to verify that the correct number of records was inserted in the following situations: - 請確認已插入一筆記錄。Verify that only a single record was inserted. 有時候撰寫不正確的 insert 陳述式可以插入多筆記錄。Sometimes an improperly written insert statement can insert multiple records. - 確認不會引發例外狀況的插入作業期間發生錯誤時，已插入一筆記錄。Verify that a record was inserted when an error occurs during the insert operation that does not raise an exception. - 確認已插入一筆記錄，當資料來源控制項支援衝突偵測 （開放式並行存取），例如並控制項，具有其屬性設定為`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`列舉值。Verify that a record was inserted when a data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency), such as the and controls, has its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value. 在此設定時，可能不會插入同時具有相同索引鍵值為另一位使用者記錄的記錄。Under this setting, a record that has the same key value as a record by another user concurrently might not be inserted. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，確認插入作業期間已插入一筆記錄。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to verify that a record was inserted during the insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得插入作業中引發的例外狀況 (如果有的話)。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation.

value.span: ，表示插入作業中引發的例外狀況。

span.span: An that represents the exception that was raised during the insert operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷例外狀況 （如果有的話） 插入作業期間所引發。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the insert operation. 如果沒有引發例外狀況，這個屬性會傳回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引發例外狀況，而且您決定要處理的事件處理常式中的例外狀況，請務必設定屬性，以`true`; 否則即為控制重新擲回例外狀況。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the control re-throws the exception. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷是否已插入作業期間引發例外狀況。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception was raised during an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否在事件處理常式中處理插入作業中引發的例外狀況。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the insert operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果例外狀況在事件處理常式中已經過處理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當插入作業期間引發例外狀況時，使用屬性，指出是否處理例外狀況在事件處理常式。When an exception is raised during the insert operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，會被視為處理，而且不會重新擲回的例外狀況。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown. 如果這個屬性設定為`false`，則控制重新擲回例外狀況。If this property is set to `false`, the control re-throws the exception. 若要判斷引發的例外狀況，請使用屬性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來表示，處理例外狀況在事件處理常式。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepInInsertMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 控制項是否在插入作業後停留在插入模式中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should remain in insert mode after an insert operation.

value.span: 會在插入作業後停留在插入模式中，否則為 。

span.span: to remain in insert mode after an insert operation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，控制權回到指定的模式屬性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property. 使用屬性來指定是否控制項是否插入作業後停留在插入模式。Use the property to specify whether the control should remain in insert mode after an insert operation. 若要保持控制項處於插入模式，將此屬性設定為`true`。To keep the control in insert mode, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 只有一種情況發生時 （例如引發例外狀況） 需要比平常有不同的行為的控制項，則應該使用這個屬性。This property should be used only when a situation occurs (such as an exception being raised) that requires the control to behave differently than it normally would. 如果控制項處於插入模式，根據預設，請將需要屬性改為。If the control needs to remain in insert mode by default, set the property instead. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性，以保留控制項處於插入模式時插入作業期間發生的例外狀況。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to keep the control in insert mode when an exception occurs during an insert operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/CS/formviewinsertedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgs/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Values As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 取得字典，其包含已插入之資料錄的欄位名稱/值組。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

value.span: 物件，包含已插入資料錄索引鍵欄位名稱/值組的字典。

span.span: An object that contains a dictionary of key field name/value pairs for the inserted record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取插入之資料錄欄位的值。Use the property to access the values of the fields for the inserted record. 例如，您可以使用這些值來插入記錄的記錄。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of inserted records. 屬性會傳回可實作物件介面。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 物件包含物件，表示插入資料錄的欄位。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the inserted record. 若要存取的欄位名稱，請使用屬性物件。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同樣地，您可以存取的欄位值，使用屬性。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 您也可以當作捷徑使用，使用的索引子物件來存取欄位值直接。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. 使用索引子的優點是，它會直接傳回欄位值。The advantage in using the indexer is that it returns field values directly. 資料來源的欄位順序所依賴的控制項 (例如) 可以僅依索引存取欄位的值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何逐一查看中的項目集合。The following example demonstrates how to iterate through the items in the collection. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewInsertedEventArgsValues#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgsValues/CS/formviewinsertedeventargsvaluescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewInsertedEventArgsValues#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewInsertedEventArgsValues/VB/formviewinsertedeventargsvaluesvb.aspx#1)]
